themes: Need for increased opportunities for Black artists
Impact of housing crisis and gentrification on Black community
National climate of anti-affirmative action and anti-DEI
Stereotyping and marginalization of Black people
Importance of supporting Black stories and culture
Appreciation for the Elevate Grant program
key_phrases: more opportunities for Black artists in Austin
Austin's Black community--and culture--is not only actively shrinking because of the housing crisis and gentrification
We are actively under attack nationwide
Everyone knows what anti-affirmative action and anti-DEI means for us
We are not the model minority
to far too many we are still the scapegoats, the thugs, the political troublemakers
I feel grateful that Austin has a literal Elevate Grant
support for us as we wade through the great Blacklash of a post-Black Lives Matter society
our stories have never been more important
barriers_identified: national anti-affirmative action and anti-DEI policies
